title: Google\Cloud\Dataplex\V1\StorageFormat
name: StorageFormat
description:
Describes the format of the data within its storage location.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataplex.v1.StorageFormat

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.format
params.description: Output only. The data format associated with the stored data, which represents content type values. The value is inferred from mime type.

params.name: data.compression_format
params.description: Optional. The compression type associated with the stored data. If unspecified, the data is uncompressed.

params.name: data.mime_type
params.description: Required. The mime type descriptor for the data. Must match the pattern {type}/{subtype}. Supported values: - application/x-parquet - application/x-avro - application/x-orc - application/x-tfrecord - application/json - application/{subtypes} - text/csv - text/ - image/{image subtype} - video/{video subtype} - audio/{audio subtype}

params.name: data.csv
params.description: Optional. Additional information about CSV formatted data.

params.name: data.json
params.description: Optional. Additional information about CSV formatted data.
